desc.en: The route map of Beijing's all kinds of rail routes. It includes Beijing Subway, Beijing City Suburban Railway, the route of China Railway which pass Beijing.
desc.zh-Hans: 北京铁路线全图。包括北京地铁、北京市郊铁路以及中国国家铁路经过北京的部分

updateHistory.reason: Add Beijing template from RMP and fix known issues.
Fine tune the distance between each subway station and adjust the location of station names to make them closer to the official route map provided
Fixing station translations such as National Art Museum and overlapping station names such as those on YZT1..
Fix station names of Keyi Lu Huayuan Qiao and Yizhuang Qiao while improving alignment of Line 16..
Changed the layout to make it look more like the official Beijing Subway map.
Add Tiananmen and change airport facilities
Fix facility icons that are not shown in the picture.
Fix color of YZT1 and Xijiao Line
Add line 17 north line 16 last part and line 11 east last part
Add Line 3 and 12 and Changping Line rest part
Added suspension information for Bajiao Amusement Park station of Line 1 and update description
New template of subway and suburban railway and China railway of Beijing
